we have been looking forward to a relaxing vacation getting away from the stress of a busy work schedule

1: Le Blanc is the perfect place for a honeymoon or couples getaway
Everything about the trip was perfect our rooms our service the pools beach gym spa and massages food

Within moments we are shown to our suite by Rogelio aka Roger who is one of those people you just want to keep on thanking as it is his ability to communicate with the staff to make sure that we their family having nothing to want for
These are staff members who went out of their way to make our trip extra special
The hotel was absolutely stunning and the staff made the trip so special for us
We are already planning are trip back in January
He quickly had secure transport set up to make the trip to the resort to retrieve my husband ’s belongings
Third trip to LeBlanc Cancun was a charm
Le blanc resort and spa is a wonderful choice when considering adults only very chill vacation in Cancun Mexico
Adults only is the way to Vacation
